alert.note: Alert for Choctaw (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 14 at 5:55PM CDT until May 14 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Choctaw County in southwestern Alabama... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 555 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles northeast of Lisman, or 9 miles north of Butler, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Butler and Lisman. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
